Class LoginPage

java.lang.Object
LoginPage
public class LoginPage extends Object
Represents the login page for users to log into CAMS.

  • Method Details

    • login

      public static User login()
      Allows user to login to CAMS.

    • ExtractUserName

      public static String ExtractUserName(String Email)
      Extracts userID from a given email address. ie. "KOH1" in "KOH1@e.ntu.edu.sg".
      Parameters:
      Email - The given email for the userID to be extracted from.
      Returns:
      The userID extracted from the given email address.

    • createStudentAccount

      public static Student createStudentAccount()
      Allows a new student account to be created.
      Returns:
      Returns the new Student object being created.

    • createStaffAccount

      public static Staff createStaffAccount()
      Allows a new staff account to be created.
      Returns:
      Returns the new Staff object being created.

    • studentLogin

      public static Student studentLogin(StudentList studentList, String UserID, String StudentPassword)
      Facilitates the login of a Student based on the given list of existing student accounts, as well as the inputted userID and password.
      Parameters:
      studentList - List of existing (registered) student accounts.
      UserID - The input student ID.
      StudentPassword - The input student password.
      Returns:
      Returns the respective student object corresponding to the input details. If the userID and/or password is invalid, a null object is returned.

    • staffLogin

      public static Staff staffLogin(StaffList staffList, String UserID, String StaffPassword)
      Facilitates the login of a Staff based on the given list of existing staff accounts, as well as the inputted userID and password.
      Parameters:
      staffList - List of existing (registered) staff accounts.
      UserID - The input staff ID.
      StaffPassword - The input staff password.
      Returns:
      Returns the respective staff object corresponding to the input details. If the userID and/or password is invalid, a null object is returned.

    • changePassword

      public static void changePassword(User user)
      Allows the given user's password to be changed.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose password is to be changed.

    • getLogout

      public static int getLogout()
      Returns the current logout status.

    • setLogout

      public static void setLogout(int i)
      Sets the current logout status with the given input.
      Parameters:
      i - Reflects the logout status after the function has been executed. 1 represents logged out, while 0 represents logged in.

    • Logout

      public static int Logout()
      Executes a logout.
      Returns:
      The logout status after the method has been executed.
